医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
怀孕期间摄入高亚油酸可能会损害胎儿生长并增加肥胖风险怀孕期间母亲摄入大量亚油酸可能会影响胎儿发育并增加后代肥胖和炎症的风险。然而，需要更多的研究来充分了解这些对人类的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/High-linoleic-acid-intake-during-pregnancy-may-harm-fetal-growth-and-raise-obesity-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/High-linoleic-acid-intake-during-pregnancy-may-harm-fetal-growth-and-raise-obesity-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54361a78-4648-4203-94a1-8ca1b579fde8 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 00:44:00 -0400 High linoleic acid intake during pregnancy may harm fetal growth and raise obesity risk
研究揭示了 SARS-CoV-2 抗体的全人群免疫设定点研究人员发现，无论个人疫苗接种或感染史如何，多米尼加共和国的 SARS-CoV-2 抗体水平都趋于全民免疫设定点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Study-reveals-population-wide-immune-setpoint-for-SARS-CoV-2-antibodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Study-reveals-population-wide-immune-setpoint-for-SARS-CoV-2-antibodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f74f2ab5-3111-4d16-8d74-f8c657df77d3 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 00:07:00 -0400 Study reveals population-wide immune setpoint for SARS-CoV-2 antibodies
流行病压力促使年轻人转向大麻研究探讨了 COVID-19 大流行如何影响年轻人大麻使用的增加，强调了应对机制中的关键性别差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Pandemic-stress-drove-young-adults-to-turn-to-cannabis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Pandemic-stress-drove-young-adults-to-turn-to-cannabis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=699b3e7b-97b6-4012-98de-934671f6a288 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 23:15:00 -0400 Pandemic stress drove young adults to turn to cannabis
发现针对有健康问题的老年人接种 RSV 疫苗具有成本效益根据一项新的模型研究，针对有潜在健康问题的老年人进行呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 疫苗接种计划是一种具有成本效益的减少疾病的方法 https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/10.1503/cmaj .240452（CMAJ）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Targeted-RSV-vaccination-for-older-adults-with-health-conditions-found-cost-efficient.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Targeted-RSV-vaccination-for-older-adults-with-health-conditions-found-cost-efficient.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2abb0e9f-6bfc-4afc-a410-ece4b08d215e Mon, 09 Sep 2024 23:11:17 -0400 Targeted RSV vaccination for older adults with health conditions found cost-effective
过早接触空气污染与成年后经济收入较低有关哈佛大学陈曾熙公共卫生学院、哈佛大学约翰·A·保尔森工程与应用科学学院和欧洲大学的一项新研究表明，婴儿期接触细颗粒空气污染 (PM2.5) 的风险较高，成年后经济收入较低罗马的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Early-exposure-to-air-pollution-linked-with-lower-economic-earnings-in-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Early-exposure-to-air-pollution-linked-with-lower-economic-earnings-in-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d952cef-be13-4273-92b3-054da1a87d8f Mon, 09 Sep 2024 23:06:00 -0400 Early exposure to air pollution associated with lower economic earnings in adulthood
维生素 D 补充剂对心脏代谢健康具有良好的影响来自中国和美国机构的科学家进行的最新系统综述和荟萃分析揭示了维生素 D 补充剂如何显着影响心脏代谢健康的有前景的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Vitamin-D-supplementation-shows-promising-impact-on-cardiometabolic-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Vitamin-D-supplementation-shows-promising-impact-on-cardiometabolic-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5356e0e-7057-4f15-b9b3-4b9176b7407c Mon, 09 Sep 2024 23:00:51 -0400 Vitamin D supplementation shows promising impact on cardiometabolic health
智能手机检测到的语音变化可能预示着慢性阻塞性肺病症状的爆发根据在奥地利维也纳举行的欧洲呼吸学会 (ERS) 大会上提出的一项试点研究，智能手机上记录的人们声音的变化可能预示着慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD) 症状的严重发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Voice-changes-Detected-by-smartphone-may-signal-COPD-symptom-flare-ups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Voice-changes-Detected-by-smartphone-may-signal-COPD-symptom-flare-ups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fb1dc2b-5a1a-4c23-9da1-c11c60af2c95 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 22:53:35 -0400 Voice changes detected by smartphone may signal COPD symptom flare-ups
新的人工智能技术使用语音分析来检测未确诊的 2 型糖尿病将于今年在马德里举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会（9 月 9 日至 13 日）上公布的新研究强调了使用语音分析检测未确诊 2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 病例的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/New-AI-technology-uses-voice-analysis-to-detect-undiagnosed-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/New-AI-technology-uses-voice-analysis-to-detect-undiagnosed-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0148e1d-20c1-4b18-83bf-313916a6affe Mon, 09 Sep 2024 22:49:05 -0400 New AI technology uses voice analysis to detect undiagnosed type 2 diabetes
早期吸烟与年轻人呼吸道疾病的增加有关根据在奥地利维也纳举行的欧洲呼吸学会 (ERS) 大会上发表的研究，18 岁以下开始吸烟的人在 20 多岁时更有可能出现呼吸系统症状，例如喘息和痰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Early-smoking-tied-to-increased-respiratory-problems-in-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Early-smoking-tied-to-increased-respiratory-problems-in-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eabc9b58-c524-439b-a93c-007823aaf31a Mon, 09 Sep 2024 22:46:29 -0400 Early smoking tied to increased respiratory problems in young adults
欧洲运动员声称铁人三项赛跑得最快，尽管美国运动员的参与度更高，但仍超过了美国人欧洲铁人三项运动员在欧洲平坦、快速的赛道上以最快的成绩统治了铁人三项比赛，尽管美国参赛者人数较多，但其速度仍超过美国参赛者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/European-athletes-claim-fastest-Ironman-times-outpacing-Americans-despite-higher-US-participation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/European-athletes-claim-fastest-Ironman-times-outpacing-Americans-despite-higher-US-participation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=802a5dc4-d752-4f24-999f-852f7be14f84 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 22:46:00 -0400 European athletes claim fastest Ironman times, outpacing Americans despite higher U.S. participation
